main event: Observers reported seeing a white light in the sky over Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The first report states that the light was stationary and observed for 10 minutes., Two witnesses discussed the UFO and both thought it was a star., Additional information on the sighting was requested but not received., There was insufficient data for proper evaluation in a subsequent report., The object was described as brighter than an airplane light and had the ability to change brightness and shape.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
witness description: Observers believed the object was a star.
